meanings.definition: Unable to be narrated or described.
meanings.sent1: The beauty of the sunset was inenarrable.
meanings.sent2: The inenarrable pain in his heart made it hard to speak.
meanings.sent3: The inenarrable amount of cookies she ate left everyone in shock.
meanings.sent4: Her inenarrable talent on the piano was like magic to the audience.
meanings.sent5: The inenarrable joy of seeing her newborn baby brought tears to her eyes.

meanings.definition: Beyond the power of words to express.
meanings.sent1: The vastness of the universe is truly inenarrable.
meanings.sent2: The inenarrable love between the couple was evident in their eyes.
meanings.sent3: His inenarrable appetite for pizza always amazed his friends.
meanings.sent4: The inenarrable strength of the tiny ant impressed the onlookers.
meanings.sent5: The inenarrable beauty of the waterfall took her breath away.
